Sentencas: We demonstrate the possibility of direct power generation from waste coffee grounds (WCG) via high-temperature carbon fuel cell technology.
Titulo: Direct power generation from waste coffee grounds in a biomass fuel cell

Sentencas: At 900 degrees C, the WCG-powered fuel cell exhibits a maximum power density that is twice than carbon black.
Titulo: Direct power generation from waste coffee grounds in a biomass fuel cell

Sentencas: Our results suggest that the heteroatoms and hydrogen contained in WCG are crucial in providing good cell performance due to its in-situ gasification, without any need for pre-reforming.
Titulo: Direct power generation from waste coffee grounds in a biomass fuel cell

Sentencas: As a first report on the use of coffee as a carbon-neutral fuel, this study shows the potential of waste biomass (e.g. WCG) in sustainable electricity generation in fuel cells.
Titulo: Direct power generation from waste coffee grounds in a biomass fuel cell
